entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
